thread.title: Industry Vet (and His Pet Iguanas) Hired To Help Take Nexxt To Next Level

author: cnbc.com
title: Industry Vet (and His Pet Iguanas) Hired To Help Take Nexxt To Next Level
text:
Leading recruitment media company brings on new Chief Operating Officer and two six-foot iguanas to help guide organization’s growth and revenue
KING OF PRUSSIA, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Nexxt , a recruitment media company, today announced that Andrew Katz has joined the company as Chief Operating Officer. With more than 20 years’ experience in the human resources industry, Katz will play an integral role in the company by overseeing all business operations, including Nexxt’s business development, recruitment advertising, and strategic alliance efforts. Katz will be aided by his two pet iguanas, Iggy and Princess.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180327005888/en/
For a photo of Andy without iguanas visit about.nexxt.com . (Photo: Business Wire)
“Andy is a tremendously well-respected industry leader who brings over two decades of HR expertise to the Nexxt family,” said Rich Milgram, CEO of Nexxt. “Andy’s high energy personality makes him a perfect fit to join our team of experienced leaders and we are thrilled to be bringing him on board. He will undoubtedly be able to contribute and have an impact in all areas of our business.”
Prior to joining Nexxt, Katz served as President of Startwire where he was responsible for managing all staffers and over 80 external partnerships. During his tenure, Katz doubled Startwires’s sales and active member base. Before joining Startwire, Katz served as Senior Vice President of Global Business Development and Channel Partners at Symphony Talent (formerly Findly). In this role, he established new global sales channels and formulated technology and service partnerships with enterprise clients and resellers. In addition to his work at Symphony Talent, his career was launched at Bernard Hodes Group where he advanced into several executive roles.
“It’s a pleasure to join an established organization that knows the HR space inside and out. I’m looking forward to working with the Nexxt team and our clients to deliver high-impact results,” said Andy Katz, COO at Nexxt.
When he’s not working to build relationships and land job seekers their dream gig, Katz enjoys spending time with his family and friends, and playing excessive amounts of Sudoku. Katz has served as an advisory board member of Work4, a social and mobile recruiting company, since 2015. He earned a B.A. from Rutgers University in Advertising, Marketing and Psychology.
About Nexxt
Nexxt, a recruitment media company, is a dynamic employment solution catering to the next generation of hiring. For companies and agencies, Nexxt is a full-service recruitment marketing platform, providing a targeted method of sourcing the best people from a broader talent pool. For professionals, Nexxt is an employment solution, powering more than 50 niche career sites to make finding the perfect job easier. Nexxt combines predictive technology with multi-channel marketing to a diversified talent network of nearly 60 million candidates on focused career sites, allowing recruiters and hiring managers to build custom campaigns and efficiently fulfill their hiring needs. To learn more and see what’s Nexxt, please visit www.nexxt.com .
